creator: Kolay
descriptionHtml:
Kolay is an all-in-one HR software focused on mobile solutions.

With Kolay mobile app, employees can request leave, overtime (coming soon), and more through their private accounts. HR managers can manage all the requests on the go!

Using this app requires a Kolay account. Use your current account or sign up for a 15-day trial on kolayik.com.

Here is the full list of what you can do with Kolay mobile app:

Don't miss any activity
Follow what is going on at work in the past, present, and future. See upcoming company events, birthdays, absences, and more.

Get in touch with your colleagues
Call your colleagues or send an email without any hassle.

Request any leave with one click
Request any type of leave on the go. More request types including overtime and expense are coming soon!

Manage pending requests
Access and process any request from your colleagues. Spend less time doing paperwork and more time reaching your business goals.

Keep track of all your requests
View the status of your pending requests anytime, from anywhere.

Updates and new features are coming soon!
descriptionShort: Manage Your HR Tasks On The Go

appDetails.developerAddress:
Nef 09 Plaza A Blok K 11
Sultan Selim Mah. Lalegül Sok. No:10 Kağıthane/İstanbul
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Minor problems and bug fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We baked many fixes and improvements ready for you to taste.

Improvements
• You can view and download files from the files or profile section.
• You can preview PDF documents and images without download first.
• You can quickly copy or share any piece of information from the profile section.

Fixes
• We improved the experience of searching for a substitute while requesting a leave.
• We fixed a problem that was preventing certain users from logging in.

Follow what is going on at work in the past, present, and future. See upcoming company events, birthdays, absences, and more.

Get in touch with your colleagues
Call your colleagues or send an email without any hassle.

Request any leave with one click
Request any type of leave on the go. More request types including overtime and expense are coming soon!

Manage pending requests
Access and process any request from your colleagues. Spend less time doing paperwork and more time reaching your business goals.

Keep track of all your requests
View the status of your pending requests anytime, from anywhere.

Updates and new features are coming soon!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We have fixed an issue with characters that caused them to display incorrectly in some instances.
- We have sorted the expense category list, making it easier to find what you need.
- We have fixed a scrolling issue in the compensations section and have now ordered everything by date.
- We have fixed the todos badge so that it accurately reflects your activity list.
- Lastly, we have changed the welcome card to give you a better introduction to the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
